trans-unit.source: Provides the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form"></xref> adapter for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlFormAdapter"></xref> class.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Returns a collection of postback values.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Override this method if you need to collect the values of any postback variables in the control.
A collection of postback values.
Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
A strongly typed reference to the associated control.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event was handled.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Name of the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Generates the target-specific markup for the control to which the control adapter is attached, using the provided writer.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The text writer to receive output.
Renders the <xref uid="langword_csharp_< card >" name="< card >" href=""></xref> tag.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The base implementation renders a `< card >` element with the given attributes.
Inheriting adapters can override this method and modify the dictionary of attributes, before calling the base implementation.
The text writer.
The specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_< card >" name="< card >" href=""></xref> attributes.
Renders any additional markup immediately following the <xref uid="langword_csharp_< card >" name="< card >" href=""></xref> tag in the WML deck.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Inheriting classes can override this method to customize output.
The text writer.
Renders the pager user interface for the form.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The text writer
